DOC.brief_summary: Healthy Mothers Move ( Healthy MOMs ) , prospective randomize controlled trial aim demonstrate effectiveness healthy lifestyle intervention reduce risk factor obesity type 2 diabetes . This behavioral intervention tailor need pregnant postpartum Latino woman . This study conduct 2004 2006 southwest Detroit .
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims 1 . Intervention group participant improve level protective behavior ( improve daily dietary composition increase level physical activity ) reduce risk type 2 diabetes compare control group . 2 . Intervention group participant improve status clinical measure risk type 2 diabetes ( anthropometric metabolic status ) compare control group . 3 . To assess whether theory-based variable , include change attitude , behavioral control belief , perceive social support behavioral intention change baseline , whether change influence behavioral outcome . 4 . To identify aspect project plan implementation contribute achievement behavioral clinical outcome . Measures include recruitment , retention intervention participation rate , barrier facilitator participation ; community involvement , satisfaction , intervention component project activity ; fidelity intervention component .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old A resident Southwest Detroit Less 20 week gestational eligibility screen woman : Type 1 type 2 diabetes Incompetent cervix/cerclage Active thyroid Multiple gestation Cardiac , vascular pulmonary disease Drug alcohol addiction Serious physical mental illness condition would substantially interfere participation completion entire intervention
